question:
Which of the following cases amount to be some work done in terms of Physics?
  1. A man pushing a wall but failing to move it
  2. A coolie standing with a load of 12 kg on his head
  3. A boy climbing up a staircase
  4. A boy carrying a box on his head and sliding over a frictionless horizontal surface
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: In case (iii) work is done, because displacement is produced in the direction of applied force. In cases (i), (ii) and (iv), no work is done as no displacement occurs in the direction of applied force.
